com.salimov.yurii.dao.impl

Class MessageDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.dao.impl.MessageDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataDao<Message,java.lang.Long>, MessageDao

    @Repository
public final class MessageDaoImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageDao
    The interface provides a set of standard methods for working Message objects with the Cache.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yuriy.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    MessageDao, Message
